properties.short description: Count Rainulf II of Caiazzo and Alife Renders Homage to Roger II
properties.description: Count Rainulf renders homage to Roger II in return for an oath of fealty from Count Roger of Ariano.
properties.people:
Roger II, King
Rainulf II, Count of Caiazzo and Alife
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).

properties.description: By paying homage to Pope Honorius II, Roger II received the title of duke.
properties.people:
Honorius II, Pope
Roger II, King
properties.source: The History of the Most Serene Roger, First King of Sicily in Roger II and the Creation of the Kingdom of Siclly, trans. and ed. Graham A. Loud (Manchester, Eng. and New York: Manchester University Press, 2012).
